title: Wire coil parallel to changing magnetic field

content.prompt: A 100-turn wire coil has a resistance of 400 â„¦ and a cross-sectional area of 0.01 m2. The coil is placed in a magnetic field directed parallel to the axis of the coil. If the field changes at a rate of -0.4 T/s, what is the current induced in the coil?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
